Can't wait to listen to the latest episode of #TheReceiptsPodcast
2017: Build! 🔑 in every aspect of life
@medview_info what if my trip wasn't two weeks?! So I leave Lagos without luggage and nobody would be able to claim it?! You people are ok
@medview_info if it's even to start a petition to get you banned from the London Gatwick route trust me I will start it up!!
@medview_info please know that I'll be seeking some form of compensation. Well over a week and no luggage. It's unacceptable.
@aviationtravels @medview_info @Gatwick_Airport Gatwick better take note! You shouldn't be allowed on the London to Lagos route!
@aviationtravels @medview_info @Gatwick_Airport zero customer service and no communication with all the passengers you have wronged!
@aviationtravels @medview_info @Gatwick_Airport stop lying, we're spending thousands of pounds to fly on your crappy airline and no bags!
@aviationtravels @medview_info @Gatwick_Airport please explain why my luggages weren't brought in today and now you're sat Thursday?!
@FashionQuirk @medview_info just left the airport now. Was told them same. They also had the audacity to ask me if I'm enjoying Christmas
@Sarnie_p hiya, did any bags come in today? Dont want to waste my time at the airport. Some people told me today others say tomorrow.
@FashionQuirk @medview_info hey Hun we're there bags today? This stupid airline wolfing confirm if bags were coming in today
Can I get an update on when I will be receiving my luggages? Nobody's answering phones, your office is open but nobody there @medview_info
Can I get an update on when I will be receiving my luggages? Nobody's answering phones, your office is open but nobody there @MedviewUk
My ticket wasn't even cheap 😡 I'm fuming! How dare you charge business class prices for barely mediocre service @medview_info
No communication, we don't even know when our bags are going to arrive @medview_info 😡waited 3hrs in the airport
They've been doing it all week apparently, so people who flew in on Tuesday had luggage on our flight??! Instead of our own? @medview_info
Or luggage. I checked in from 6pm. My flight was 9:30pm there no reason why my luggage shouldn't have made it on the flight @medview_info
People of you want piece of mind and everything to run smoothly do not fly @medview_info ! They carried 400 of us and not a single one of
Lol my cousin got me upgraded.. I knew he'd come in handy
I'm running on 4 hours sleep 😫
Yay, skiing with the ladies next year 🙃. Now this should be adventurous

I bet you the reason she's stalling is becoz my dress is with a seamstress in Yaba or Agege, she probably didn't sew it or have the skill to
I've asked four separate times and this designer still hasn't sent me the pictures. Each time she replies with "1 sec "or "sure I'm coming"
Finally watched 'Girl on the train', I think I would have preferred the novel.
Still haven't received any pics hours later. So I've had to ask again, but why doesn't she want to send me pics lol I don't understand...
Tailors confuse me! I asked to see a pic of the finish product before she ships out my dress. She replies "Thank you for your custom" 🤔 lol
